info.title: Lender API
info.description: Manages lenders and their related rules.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to return all lenders.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Anything in the relation section that needs to be included in the response.

get.description:
Fetch a paginated list of all lenders. Can filter by parent lender ID to fetch all sub lenders.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

post.description:
Create a new lender.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

get.description:
Get the details for a single lender, also returns the current allocation based upon todays date and the list of expert users for the lender. Includes any sub lenders and if this is a sub lender, its parent lender.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

put.description:
Update a lenders information.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Remove a lender from the system.

Requires the lender_remover role to access.

get.summary: Get all of a lenders allocations

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to retrieve all results.

get.description:
Returns a paginated list of all allocations for a lender. Can be filtered by date to return the currently active allocation.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

post.description:
Create a new lender allocation.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a specific lender allocation.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

put.description:
Update a lenders allocation.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Removes a lender allocation from the system.

Requires the lender_remover role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a paginated list of all users for a lender. Can pass in a subject identifier to filter the users.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Set to -1 to return all users.

post.summary: Add a user to a lender
post.description:
Add a user onto a lender.

Requires the lender_writer role for access.

get.description:
Fetches a single lender user.

Requires the lender_reader role to access.

put.description:
Updates a lender user record.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Removes a user from a lender.

Requires the lender_writer role to access.

get.description: Gets all users for all sub lenders of a parent lender account.

createdBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

createdDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

createdBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

createdDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

createdBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedDate.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.

updatedBy.description: Not to be sent on POST/PUT/PATCH.
